mapper.select: SELECT n.noticeNo AS noticeNo, n.content AS content, n.startDate AS startDate, n.endDate AS endDate, n.uploadDate AS uploadDate, n.title AS title, u.userNo AS userNo, u.name AS name FROM notice n LEFT JOIN user u ON n.userNo = u.userNo
